name: Dark Magician
description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

name: Gabumon the Fierce Dragon
description: A ferocious dragon with a fiery breath.

name: skeledirge the Forbidden One
description: The forbidden one, when all parts are assembled, guarantees victory.

name: Ulfo the Dark Master
description: A powerful monster with a dark aura.

name: Feraligatr the Triple Dragon
description: A fusion of three Blue-Eyes White Dragons, incredibly powerful.

name: Charizard the Dragon Slayer
